item.description:
Cool Cat Charity Concert > Sunday, September 18 at 12:00pm > Location: The Singletary Rod & Gun Club Oxford, MA >Please join us for a fun-filled afternoon! Food and entertainment provided by The Randy & Dave Show, Dan Chauvin and Jessie & Matt. Free face painting and other fun activities will be available for children. All proceeds will benefit BV CATS, Inc., a local non-profit organization dedicated to reducing cat population while improving the lives of stray and feral cats in Blackstone Valley and surrounding areas. Tickets are $10 for adults, $6 for children 12 and under. Children ages 5 and under are free. Tickets can be purchased in advance or at the door.

BVCats rescues stray cats - they catch, neuter or spay them and try to find homes - all volunteer - it is a lot of work and all the money raised goes to feeding and vet bills. Right now they have about 30 cats that need homes - some are barn cats. BVCats takes care of these animals!!!!! Check out their websitehttp://www.bvcats.org/events.php
item.name: check out the "Cool Cat Charity Concert"...
